t.x: The study of matter, energy, motion, and force. Deals with principles of natural phenomena.
e: I learn about physics.
Physics is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of physics is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of physics is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: The ability to move or deform an object. In physics, refers to 'force'.
e: I learn about force / power / strength.
Force / Power / Strength is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of force / power / strength is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of force / power / strength is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: The ability to do work. In physics, exists in forms like motion, heat, light, etc.
e: I learn about energy.
Energy is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of energy is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of energy is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: The force that pulls objects toward Earth's center. Newton's universal gravitation.
e: I learn about gravity.
Gravity is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of gravity is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of gravity is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: How fast an object moves. Distance traveled per unit time.
e: I learn about speed / velocity.
Speed / Velocity is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of speed / velocity is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of speed / velocity is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: The amount of matter an object has. Different concept from weight.
e: I learn about mass.
Mass is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of mass is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of mass is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: Electromagnetic waves that make things visible. Energy from a light source.
e: I learn about light.
Light is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of light is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of light is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: Energy produced by the flow of electric charge. Essential element of modern civilization.
e: I learn about electricity.
Electricity is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of electricity is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of electricity is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: The degree of hotness or coldness of an object. Measured in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
e: I learn about temperature.
Temperature is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of temperature is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of temperature is essential for explaining natural phenomena.

t.x: A phenomenon where vibrations spread as energy is transmitted. Sound, light, water waves, etc.
e: I learn about wave.
Wave is an important concept.
Understanding the principle of wave is fundamental to physics.
Deep understanding of wave is essential for explaining natural phenomena.
